Package com.example.qrhunter.utils

Class QRCodeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.qrhunter.utils.QRCodeUtil
  • public final class QRCodeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing all the helper functions for QRCode. You shouldn't have to initialize a QRCodeUtil object.

    • Constructor Summary

      QRCodeUtil()

      • convertDocumentToQRCode

        public static QRCode convertDocumentToQRCode​(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot qrCodeDoc)
        Converts A Document Snapshot object to a QR Code object. Used when getting data from Firestore
        Parameters:

        Returns:
